meanings.definition: Mechanizers: Those who mechanize or automate processes.
meanings.sent1: The mechanizers in the factory work hard to automate production.
meanings.sent2: We hired mechanizers to streamline our operations and increase efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The mechanizers at the office made the work seem like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent4: The mechanizers transformed the outdated system into a modern marvel.
meanings.sent5: The mechanizers were like wizards, turning manual tasks into automated wonders.

meanings.definition: Mechanizers: The act of mechanizing or automating processes.
meanings.sent1: The mechanizers of the assembly line saved time and effort.
meanings.sent2: Automation and mechanizers have revolutionized the industry.
meanings.sent3: The mechanizers of the old system were replaced with new technology.
meanings.sent4: The mechanizers of the past paved the way for a more efficient future.
meanings.sent5: The mechanizers hummed with precision, making work easier for everyone.
